> [sirenyc](#comment_90_19sggoAZ4hcorrrfWoFWP9rwfpVsL29cnZ): Will the to download music or just study the site?

At the very top of the page it says "Welcome to NinjaBeats - coming soon 2017" in large letters... Further details on the middle of the page where it says "Our launch date, roadmap and how you can help".

Currently it's just an announcement and gaining recognition while we're ripping, verifying, creating torrents, making the listing, etc... in the background. We are uncertain of the launch date but we're aiming for early 2017, or possibly earlier if we're ready earlier. While we're working on that, you can see our progress on that page, as well as what our aim is once we launch.

I'll be updating this listing when we launch!

> [edantes](#comment_6_1JF3eQjW4voiKdcvCkMXvUx5bLmZAiVdyi): Great stuff, will seed and help out if necessary.

When we launch we'll definitely be needing a few people seeding the downloads, as judging by the growth of the site so far we may have a lotta leechers on launch day. The more people seeding the website and downloads when we launch, the better! :)
